# playgroundDescription

**Instance Property**

A description of the column shown in a playground.

## Declaration

```swift
var playgroundDescription: Any { get }
```

## Getting a description of a data column

- **description**: A text representation of the column.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the column for debugging.

items.description: A text representation of the column.
